Solution.statement: Solution: MSn1-1: Log of system state

MainGoal.control_action: employs integrity verification tools to detect unauthorized changes and take the following actions when unauthorized changes are detected
MainGoal.statement: Goal: SI-7 SI-7 Main Main: information system employs integrity verification tools to detect unauthorized changes and take the following actions when unauthorized changes are detected; Impact = high, Provides= [ sat(integrityStatus),val(changeInformation),val(safeguardAction)]; aw = 1

ReqGoal.statement: Goal: SI-7 Req1: integrityInspectionHandler maintains □[sat(integrityStatus, changeInformation) V (¬sat(integrityStatus, changeInformation) ⇒ ○[respond(safeguardResp, changeInformation)]); aw = 1

ModuleGoal.statement: Module: SAC M1 : Argument over operational subgoal(s) of checkIntegrityStatus; aw = 1
Module: SAC M2 : Argument over operational subgoal(s) of activeSafeGuardAction; aw = 1

OpGoal.statement: Goal: M1 G-1: Variables = enemyPos; Condition = avoided; aw = 1
Goal: M1 G-2: Variables = priorityPath; Condition = set; aw = 1
Goal: M1 G-3: Variables = maxFuel, minFuel; Condition = maintained; aw = 1

OpGoal.condition: within the range of maxFuel and minFuel
OpGoal.statement: Goal: M1 G-4: Variables = fuel; Condition = within the range of maxFuel and minFuel; aw = 1
Goal: M2 G-1: Variables = safeguardAction; Condition = activates on anomaly detection; aw = 1
